[01:00.67]Don't say

[01:05.87]Might have to curve you if you just can't talk straight
[01:08.79]Just say

[01:46.21]You treat me like gold baby
[01:48.42]Now you wanna spoil me
[01:49.53]Did you want a trophy or you wanna sport me baby
[01:52.29]Want me on your neck 'cause you wanted respect
[01:54.32]'Cause you fightin' some war baby
[01:56.37]Well I had to bring the fists out had to put a wall up
[01:58.58]I don't trust phonies baby
[02:00.04]Yeah yeah yeah yeah

[02:02.20]'Cause you got your candy

[02:15.21]Give it to me
[02:16.00]'Cause I need you to be wise

[00:24.06]因为我察觉到了你的意图 你下意识地想要试探试探 
[00:28.02]我是否配得上在你身侧与你一同唱歌
